name: MyTreatmentOptions
0:
”Alexa, ask my treatment options”
”Alexa, ask my treatment options about psoriasis”
”Alexa, Launch my treatment options”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my treatment options
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is an Alexa skill that allows a user to obtain basic information on hundreds of diseases, illnesses and health conditions. The user invokes the skill to get information on a particular condition and the user has the option to receive more information on the condition via SMS. To get the information, the user just has to say "Alexa, ask my treatment" and then follow the prompts.
Disclaimer - The information provided in this skill is not a substitute for advice from a medical professional.



Disclaimer: The information provided is for informational and for educational purposes only and it is not a substitute for advice from a medical professional.
